connectorUiConfig.title: Cyfirma Digital Risk Connector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Cyfirma DeCYFIR/DeTCT Alerts] data connector enables seamless log ingestion from the DeCYFIR/DeTCT API into Microsoft Sentinel. Built on the Microsoft Sentinel Codeless Connector Platform, it leverages the DeCYFIR Alerts API to retrieve logs. Additionally, it supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview), which parse security data into a custom table during ingestion. This eliminates the need for query-time parsing, enhancing performance and efficiency.

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaDBWMPhishingAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaDBWMPhishingAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)
